noMasMarcas: No more tags in the document in direction
errorEjecucion: An error occurred while executing SIMAE.
errorEncoding: An error occurred while obtaining the file's encoding.
lenguajesDisponibles: SIMAE is available for .java, .cpp, .cs, and .py files.
soloEditor: SIMAE can only be executed in an editor.
ayuda:
Read tag: Ctrl+Alt+S. 
Go to next tag: Ctrl+Alt+Right. 
Go to previous tag: Ctrl+Alt+Left. 
Settings: Ctrl+Alt+C. 
Help: Ctrl+Alt+H. 
Press enter to go back.
